Home Page: You can view products in four ways:by brand, by category, by benefit, by tag. Click it, view our products information.
Product List Page: It is an express way to reach products. You can click on the second bottom button, which directs to a list of products we provide.

Favorite Page: If you want to have your own favorite list, you have to log in by Twitter firstly. To log in, please click on the second bottom button. Then you will see a login button. Click it and you will be directed to a Twitter Signin page. After signing in, you can enjoy our application more fully.

Product Page: When you click into a product page, you can see detailed information of the product provided by the other users and product manufacturer. You can see the average rates of the product and reviews about the product. You can also provide your own review and rate after you log in.

Product Page: If you click on the LocalRetail, Google map will find you and find the nearest retails providing the product you want. You can click the retail pin in the map, then you can get specific location and contact information about the retail. You will also find the ongoing deals in the retail at the same page."
Product Page: If you want to post review or reply to others reviews, click "View Review", then post your own or reply to others. You can also take a photo and post it with your review.
Manage Your Account Page: If you click the forth bottom button, you will see your favorite list and your posted reviews. Meanwhile, you can login or logout in the same page.

Skincare and makeup products are must-have for both modern women and men. 

 The inspiration for this project arose from personal experiences that are probably quite common to anybody who need to buy skincare products but do not know which one to choose from so many existing brands. 
 Most customers except some “experts or talent” in cosmetics feel lost when they decide which product to buy. 
 Most of them will search in Google, however most information are provided by manufacture and these information are full with eulogy which helps a little to a lost customer. 

 What the customer really needs is advice and review from users of a product, so we want to provide a place where users can trivially and timely post their experience and review of a product meanwhile customers can easily and conveniently look up for genuine description and review.
This is more about us than about product.
This activity shows a few different ways to invoke search, and inserts context-specific data for use by the search activity.

This activity accepts query strings via the ACTION_SEARCH intent. In a full implementation, you would use the query string to select results from your data source, and present a list of those results to the user.
